# Inflict Light Damage, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level: [[5th Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 5]]**

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One construct/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Races of Eberron (WotC), pg. 187

Transmuting energy spreads out around the targets, dealing 1d8 points of damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +25) to constructs.
